sentences.sCn: 对学生的评估都是公正的。

sentences.sContent: ...Drop in bias Brian Nosek of the University of Virginia in Charlottesville...
...They found that implicit bias has fallen by as much as 90% compared with the level found in a similar study in 2006...
...who runs a website that measures implicit bias using similar test...
...has also observed a small drop in bias in the 700...
...they also showed that those with the lowest bias were likely to subconsciously associate black skin colour with political words such as "government" or "president"...

phrases.pCn: 反向偏压；逆向偏压；反偏压

words.tran: 有偏见的；结果偏倚的，有偏的
